scene.name: Sandwich making setup
scene.description: A cutting board with bread slices, ham, and cheese ingredients scattered

task.name: Assemble and disassemble sandwich
task.description: Stack ingredients to make a sandwich and then disassemble it back to ingredients
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will make a sandwich. The goal is to stack the ingredients, and then separate them back to the board.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要制作三明治。目标是将食材堆叠起来，然后再把它们分开，放回案板上。

subtasks.description: Execute the assembly and disassembly sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please build the sandwich and then take it apart.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请制作三明治，然后再拆开。

steps.description: Place the ham on the base bread
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the ham slice and place it on the base bread.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起火腿片，把它平铺在面包底座上。

steps.description: Place the cheese on the ham
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: pick up the cheese slice and place it on top of the ham.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：拿起芝士片，把它叠在火腿上。

steps.description: Place the top bread to finish the sandwich
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: place the top bread slice on the cheese to finish the sandwich.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：把另一片面包盖在芝士上，完成三明治。

steps.description: Remove the top bread and return it
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: take the top bread off and put it back on the board.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：把顶层的面包拿下来，放回案板原位。

steps.description: Remove the cheese and return it
steps.spoken_prompt: Step five: take the cheese slice off and put it back on the board.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第五步：把芝士片拿下来，放回案板原位。

steps.description: Remove the ham and return it
steps.spoken_prompt: Step six: take the ham slice off and put it back on the board.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第六步：把火腿片拿下来，放回案板原位。

constraints.notes: Ingredients should be aligned when stacking; disassemble gently to avoid tearing the food.
